thread.title: Wal-Mart says to stop selling AR-15, other rifles
thread.title_full: Wal-Mart says to stop selling AR-15, other rifles | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Wal-Mart says to stop selling AR-15, other rifles
text:
Aug 26 Wal-Mart Stores says it will stop selling the AR-15 and other modern sports rifles at its stores due to sluggish demand.
Kory Lundberg, a spokesman for the world's largest retailer, said the decision was based solely on demand and was not related to recent high-profile shootings involving the rifles.
(Reporting by Nathan Layne ; Editing by Chris Reese )
